document.discussion_title: Olympics protest: what is the story behind Feyisa Lilesa's crossed arms?
document.topic_text: Feyisa Lilesa crossed his arms in support of the Oromo people - a marginalised ethnic community subject to months of violence by the government Independent - Sports Also reported by • Zee News Other recent news in World
